DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo School Face Painting Stencil Kits (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo School Face Painting Stencil Kit is specially designed for use during back to school or other school themed events and holidays. Includes 2 ml Snazaroo paints in 3 colors (Bright Red, Black and Bright Yellow), a sponge applicator, stencil with A+, bus, happy face and pencil. Specially designed to adjust to the curvature of the face or skin. Easy to apply and remove.
Snazaroo Mylar stencils are easy to use, durable and easy to clean. Snazaroo products are all non-toxic and hypoallergenic and meet US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 3 color Snazaroo Stencil Kit will paint about 600 cheek art designs
Includes three 2 ml Snazaroo paints in Bright Red, Black and Bright Yellow, plus a sponge applicator and Mylar stencil (A+, bus, happy face and pencil).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
